name: Gaz Guzzler
description:
The ever increasing price of gas coupled with your job as a delivery driver has put you in a very tough spot. You need gas to do your job however, these days all your money just goes towards gas. The only logical solution is to siphon gas from the customers you deliver goods to. See how long you can delay an empty tank for by becoming a criminal, just don't get caught!

Made for Ludum Dare 50 (Delay the inevitable)

Controls

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • Space to handbrake

How to play

  • Get orders from the restaurant driveway
  • Delivery food to house driveways
  • Can not deliver food while moving
  • Steal some gas after each delivery

Team

A, P
